title: QA
name: Quote Authorized
definition: Indicates that a quotation charge for special construction is authorized.
fieldNotes: The format and structure of this field is defined by ANSI in document T1.251, Identification of Telecommunications Service Provider Codes for the North American Telecommunications System.
validEntryNotes: When the ASC-EC field is populated, this field must be identical to the ASC-EC entry.
usageNotes: Optional when ACT field is "N", "C" or "T", otherwise prohibited.
